titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the minimum wage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 6/19/2001--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage (currently $5.15 per hour) to: (1) $5.65 per hour during the year beginning July 1, 2001; and (2) $6.15 per hour beginning July 1, 2002.
